statements: SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE outage_start > '2021-01-15';
SELECT id, outage_start, outage_end FROM network_outages WHERE outage_start BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-10';
SELECT affected_service, COUNT(*) FROM network_outages GROUP BY affected_service;
SELECT * FROM network_outages ORDER BY outage_start DESC;
SELECT id, outage_description FROM network_outages WHERE outage_end < '2021-03-01';
SELECT * FROM network_outages ORDER BY outage_start DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT affected_service, COUNT(*) FROM network_outages GROUP BY affected_service HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE outage_description LIKE '%server%' ORDER BY outage_start ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT affected_service FROM network_outages ORDER BY affected_service ASC;
SELECT id, outage_start, outage_end FROM network_outages WHERE outage_start < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY outage_start DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM network_outages;
SELECT outage_id, outage_date FROM network_outages ORDER BY outage_date;
SELECT * FROM service_disruptions WHERE service_affected = 'Network';
SELECT MAX(outage_duration) FROM network_outages;
SELECT disruption_date, cause FROM service_disruptions ORDER BY disruption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE outage_duration > 5 ORDER BY outage_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT affected_service, outage_duration FROM network_outages WHERE outage_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY outage_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM service_disruptions ORDER BY disruption_date DESC, service_affected ASC;
SELECT AVG(outage_duration) AS average_duration FROM network_outages;
SELECT SUM(outage_duration) AS total_duration, affected_service FROM network_outages GROUP BY affected_service HAVING total_duration > 20;
SELECT * FROM network_outages ORDER BY outage_start DESC;
SELECT location, description FROM network_outages WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE outage_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location, outage_start, outage_end FROM network_outages WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT description FROM network_outages ORDER BY outage_end ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE outage_id = 1;
SELECT location, outage_start, outage_end FROM network_outages WHERE location = 'Data Center A';
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_description, reported_at FROM disruption_reports WHERE report_id < 100;
SELECT action_id, technician_name, resolved_at FROM resolution_actions WHERE resolved_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM network_outages WHERE outage_start < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY outage_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_outages;
SELECT id, description FROM service_disruptions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM network_devices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT id, resolved FROM network_outages WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT o.reporter_name, o.report_date, n.description FROM outage_reports o JOIN network_outages n ON o.outage_id = n.id;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time, description, resolved FROM network_outages WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM service_disruptions WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Data Center 1' AND device_type = 'Switch' ORDER BY installation_date ASC;

SELECT outage_reports.reporter_name, outage_reports.report_date, network_outages.start_time, network_outages.end_time FROM outage_reports JOIN network_outages ON outage_reports.outage_id = network_outages.id;
SELECT device_name, device_type, installation_date FROM network_devices WHERE installation_date < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 year';
SELECT * FROM network_outages;
SELECT outage_date, duration, affected_service FROM service_disruptions WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT provider_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE reported_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, requirement_name, deadline FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE reported_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, disruption_date, affected_service FROM service_disruptions WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM service_providers WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name = 'Data Protection Act';
SELECT * FROM network_outages ORDER BY outage_date DESC, outage_time ASC;
